articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re Focus 2: is where our new partnership with @CoinviseCo has added significance.
We're exploring other pathways into the community such as public quests and tasks, and fun activities like contests. And a powerful tool like Coinvise, can help make this as frictionless as possible.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description: Re Focus 1: looks like enhancing our existing Scholarships initiative that @dabit3 created. We're also building out a cohort-based Fellowships program under @axisonexyz. The aim is to create a suite of distinct pathways into Developer DAO, that cater to different contexts.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
D_D x COINVISE 🎉 🎉
Access to the DAO has been a huge priority for us.
Part of our efforts to address this, was launching the $CODE token. We're also forming relationships that can facilitate this vision — which is why we’re proud to announce our newest partner @CoinviseCo
↓

1st place = 400 $CODE
2nd place = 200 $CODE
3rd place = 100 $CODE
there will be runner-up prizes of 50 $CODE tokens each 👀

Submissions will be reviewed by a team in Developer DAO, and winners will receive an airdrop via @CoinviseCo

3. Submit your meme entry by REPLYING to the first tweet in this thread, and include your wallet address or ENS. 
Note: You must complete all three steps in order to be eligible. 1 entry per-person.
